sentence: He's wrecking the Party] Chaos in GOP Senate Primaries .Ahead of Donald Trump's rally in Arizona tonight, new reports from CBS, The Associated Press and The Hill are highlighting how Trump is escalating the chaos in the AZ Republican Senate primary and in GOP primaries across the Senate battlegrounds and how Republicans are warning they risked nominating fringe candidates who would go on to lose in the general.?
